miniapp.name: Based Bingo
miniapp.subtitle: Play onchain Bingo and win $BINGO tokens
miniapp.description: A fun, free Bingo game native to Farcaster and Coinbase Wallet. Mark your card, draw numbers, and win mock $BINGO—real payouts coming soon on Base!
miniapp.tagline: Bingo on Base: Play free, win real $BINGO soon!
miniapp.ogTitle: Based Bingo – Onchain Fun on Farcaster
miniapp.ogDescription: Draw numbers, mark your card, and shout BINGO! Free play now, token wins coming.
